xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/56979-A Dinner for Them to Meet 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/c0Nr42QnbyD5Kgv4vX5eD9y2ZLC.jpg Actor Sandro Lanza is experiencing the most painful moment of his existence. After a suicide attempt, his three daughters, scattered throughout Europe, each with a different mother, come to his side. The sisters meet to decide what to do with their father, establishing a genuine tie for the very first time. A Dinner for Them to Meet
